title: Awesome and fun, but buggy
text: The gaming and graphics are amazing as always as it's been for years, but straight to the point the ads can actually ruin a run for me. Nowadays when I tap play to run, an ad would start right after the run begins and ruins the start of the game. Not only that, when I lose a run and it offers me an ad, it never loads up and suddenly I cannot exit out of the screen. This option used to work, however now I cannot get 100% of what I collected during runs since I'm forced to exit out of the app. One more thing- the magnetic shoes are just not it. When these shoes are collected they can be slightly useful, but if you jump with them to collect and item, you potentially run into a wall overhead. Meaning- the magnetic shoes are not compatible with the structure of the stage making it unfair to use the shoes at certain points. Overall good game except for interruption of ads and lag.

title: Help? Pls

title: Heartbreaking
text: I was just playing this game 35 minutes ago and a notification came up asking me wether I would like to save my progress on my iCloud or on my device. Without proper instructions I chose my iCloud because the app made it seem like I had everything the same on both. After I clicked the iCloud option it deleted all my progress that I had just made in that run. It was very frustrating and I find it completely unfair that they would make you chose where to keep your progress. Especially since this has NEVER happened. The app also gave terrible explanations on what it would do given each option. This was extremely disheartening since I had spent a while doing the wordy weekend hunt and the token run. This app SERIOUSLY needs to start making better updates and not making the game worse. Iâ€™m extremely upset and will no longer be playing the game. KILO please fix this game and give people back theyâ€™re progress on BOTH devices and iCloud. Never thought Iâ€™d have to give this game a bad rating but, all good things must come to an end. Heartbreaking

title: Definitely some issues
text:
Greetings subway surfer developers, I wanted to write this review in retrospect of the recent pride update. As a member of the LBGTQ community, we do appreciate the representation. On the other hand, I will have to admit you are greatly shoving it down peopleâ€™s throats and only raising awareness to stereotypes of the community. The game itself is very fun and I do in fact enjoy playing it whenever I can, but Iâ€™ve also had issues with keys, the leaderboard, not saving progress, and major bugs. Basically I just want yâ€™all to try and dim down some of the rainbows in the game, and also try and go through to fix the bugs that cause many people to quit playing. Many children play this game and although they should be taught that love is love, you should not put it in this game where they will only learn from stereotypes. Thatâ€™s all of the concerns I had, and once again thank you for representation, but please do it another way. 

- Sincerely, a concerned Lesbian

title: I really like this game but...
text: Donâ€™t get me wrong, I really do like this game. Except as many others are pointing out, the new update is rough. For one, the new layout is confusing and quite tacky. It just looks wrong and itâ€™s hard to find things. However, my biggest issue with this update is that itâ€™s getting so hard to get any new characters without spending irl money. Sure, new characters beforehand cost 95,000 coins in game to buy but I was ok with that. It wasnâ€™t impossible. Now though, every new character (or old character making a limited time appearance) is $3 to buy each. Thatâ€™s ridiculous! The only way to get characters with coins anymore is to buy bundles that cost 100,000 coins full of stuff that I, at least, donâ€™t really want. Itâ€™s completely ruined Wordy Weekends for me. Most of the fun was trying to get old characters you missed the first time but now they cost an absurd amount of real money. $3 for one fake character in a mobile app?! Seriously?! Screwed up a good game to make more money. Unbelievable.

So make the obvious decision on what to do about this.

title: Overall good game, but some minor complaints
text: Subway Surfers is a fun, more extensive version of Temple Run. They really want you to connect to Facebook and spend real money, but you donâ€™t have to do it to play the game fully. I love the wide array of characters and hoverboards and the different themes they do; it keeps it interesting. My largest complaint is the Super Sneakers. They are by far the WORST power up in the game. They are so disruptive to the flow of the game. They idea of having a higher jump is convenient, but the way the character bounces when wearing them is so off-setting for the flow of jumping and maneuvering through the obstacles. When on top of the trains, I have to roll to stop my jump so I donâ€™t jump too far and miss the train and crash and end my run. If the game developers changed this power up so that the jump was not as long and the character did not bounce obnoxiously while running normally, this game would have five stars for me.

title: Great game, but itâ€™s basically a scam
text: Ok so, me and my friend were playing together over the phone, and we wanted to compare our ranks.  We sent each other a screenshot of our leaderboards thinking they would be the same, but they werenâ€™t similar at all.  The only thing similar was the fact that it had the ranking system with medals and stuff.  She spent 10 dollars on the game and tried to buy some characters with the money she had spent, but the game wouldnâ€™t let her.  The button just turned grey and said it was loading, but it never did end up loading.  She thought, â€œok thatâ€™s fine I guess, Iâ€™ll try something different maybe itâ€™s just the charactersâ€¦â€ and tried to buy something else.  No matter what she tried the purchase wouldnâ€™t go through so she basically just got scammed out of her money trying to buy characters in this game and it wonâ€™t let her.  I would have rated this higher, because this game is a big part of my life, and childhood, but itâ€™s scamming people, and it scammed my friend.  That is unacceptable to me.  Please try to fix this error!

title: Fun at first, gets boring
text:
Here are the reasons I rated it 3 star:

#1: Itâ€™s very addicting and fun to play at first, and you donâ€™t want turn it off

#2: The top run thingy is very fun. It makes you push yourself harder and harder to beat the other peopleâ€™s high score. This gets you in a competitive mood and makes the game much more fun.

#3: Unlocking characters and boards is another way to have more fun in the game. You collect keys and coins over and over until you have enough to unlock that character that you just HAD to have. This gives you another thing to work towards.

Although the game has many fun features, it also has a few problems. Here is why I left off two stars

#1: Let me set the scene: Youâ€™ve seen everybody else have subway surf, so you beg your mom to let you get it. She says yes, so you go to the App Store and download it. You start playing and realize how addicting it is!! You play nonstop for hours. *2 months later* You havenâ€™t played in a bit, so you open up the app and start playing. You instantly get bored. The problem with this game is that you do the same thing over and over again, different setting or not. It gets very boring. 

#2: You canâ€™t get all the characters. Some of them cost money , and some of them you have to have a certain social media for, and some people arenâ€™t old enough to have FaceBook or whatever.

Overall itâ€™s a fun game but donâ€™t plan on it being addicting for very long

title: What a good game! Howeverâ€¦
text:
I quite enjoy playing this game. The concept is simple and itâ€™s addicting. However.. this is not to leave massive hate, but seeing the LGBTQ+ flag really caught me off guard. Not only has that community gone a little wild, but there are young kids playing this game (3-9 young) and, personally, I donâ€™t think the internet should be teaching kids about gay or transgender people, the childâ€™s parents should have that conversation with them when they are ready. Young kids shouldnâ€™t be walking up to their parents saying â€œMom! Dad! In my game I saw a rainbow flag! And then there was another one!â€ And blah blah blah. Also, a lot of LGBTQ+ haters are out there (maybe playing this game) so seeing that flag in a kids game might be very off putting, considering the world is so messed up. I hope this will make you think about this in the future.

 -lots of love

title: So Good!!!
text: I absolutely LOVE this game!! I used to play when I was younger and recently got back into it. Iâ€™m addicted all over again! Itâ€™s a great game to relax to. Itâ€™s a game that isnâ€™t too challenging, but every run is fun and once you get up to speed, you definitely have to pay attention. I love how theyâ€™re doing the rewards system now with the tokens and the season tokens. I think the ads are handled very well, where they give you extra coins or tokens if you choose to watch the ads, and theyâ€™re never more than 30 seconds. Nothing feels impossible or like itâ€™s behind a pay wall and I LOVE that. I did buy a collection, because I love the game so much and wanted to support the devs, not because I felt like I was cornered into it. Overall SO GOOD and Iâ€™m excited to see the new levels, characters, and challenges the game throws at us.

title: i am angry
text: great game. i play a lot. but i was unsatisfied with my game play today as i was winning so hard. i literally was gonna be the champion. but can you guess what happened? i bet you cant because i didnt see it coming either. there i was, an innocent kid just trying to play a simple runner game. but i die. no big deal, i had died a couple times before during this play through. i had a few keys- enough to pay for another chance, but i decided to go ahead and save them. i chose the ad option instead. the ad starts loading andâ€¦ it keeps loadingâ€¦ and it keeps loading. i realized then that it would take a while. i sat for a bit, waiting for revival. but it never came. i was a little panicked as i didnt want to lose all of my progress, but decided that since it wasnt going to work, there was no use waiting. i closed the tab to the game before reopening it to see everything i had worked so hard for was lost. all of it. there was only a day left of the week. i couldve won as the top runner. but alas, those dreams escaped my grasp. i lie here now, sulking in my own puddle of grief, the thought of the encounter taunt-fully dancing around my head; the idea of being so close yet so very far. today, i am leaving you with not 5, but 4 stars. i hope sometime in the future youâ€™ll be able to make this up to me.

title: What an actual scam
text: I was going for a score of 1 million, and I had some keys saved up from rewards. At around 700k points, I had already gone through all the ads they have for revives, and I was using only keys. I ran into an obstacle, and paid keys to revive. Then I pressed the head start powerup, and nothing happened, which made me run into another obstacle. I paid keys to revive, tried to activate a hover board, and nothing happened. Then I tried to jump, and nothing happened. App was completely unresponsive to touch, and I didnâ€™t have enough keys to keep going. I closed the app and my phone was completely responsive, and this is a brand new iphone with the newest ios. Plus, they wanted over $5 worth of keys to revive. Total scam, they make it impossible to play so you desperately pay them wayyyyyy too much for some stupid keys. Such a pay to win and awful game with greedy devs behind it. I will be keeping the game but will never ever ever send a single cent to these devs. Donâ€™t spend any money on this game ever.

title: The new update! My hopes and wishes!
text:
Ok, Iâ€™m not going to act all angry at you guys, but instead of a nice, constructive, criticism and complements. Letâ€™s start!

First off, I LOVE Subway Surfers! And think it is a awesome game with a great concept.

The new update, is kind of graphically challenging. And I agree with the majority here when we think you could do much better!

But it is different with the new update, so instead of just tapping the chart of characters and boards, I found it better to swipe across to see the next one. 

The characters for this week are awesome! I do wish that they were more- Halloweeny? I mean, they are just monsters and hybrid humans, and thatâ€™s cool! But maybe have different costumes like princesses, or dinosaurs, or pumpkin people. It would be fun!

I also wish the subway surfers character got pets, like the policeman. Like something to follow them around.

I also wish that the boards had new powers, like a magnet, or jet pack.  

Now back to the graphics, 
When I was first playing this new update I believed the â€œpumpkinsâ€ for the ramps, were actually hot rocks or coal that you put in the old trains. And when I do use this map I donâ€™t really get the Halloween vibe. 

Maybe add a ghost character!

So overall, I love the game, but think it needs some improvements, with bugs and graphics. 

Thank you for listening, and reply if you can! Like it if this helps you!

title: Enforcing Anger Issues
text: As a very calm and stable person I would recommend this app to anybody. However, that person is gone after this game! title: Slowly becoming pay to win
text:
Iâ€™ve had this game since itâ€™s early days. My top score is 21M. Iâ€™ve dedicated serious time to it, and loved every minute of it. After getting so far, I took some breaks. I came back to the game 2 nights ago to see that they added even more ads to the daily reward system (on top of already forced ads on the main screen), and a new â€œchampion packâ€ that ADDS A 5X MULTIPLIER! For a game that puts so much emphasis on the leaderboard, this is destroying the free to play fanbase. The 2x coins already hurt a f2p players chances on the board, but now adding a 5x multiplier to the paying players scoring makes top f2p scores impossible. As soon as I saw that pack, I deleted the game and refuse to redownload. You will kill this game by making it a money grab, Iâ€™m sure of it. 
The only reason you get 3 stars instead of 2 is because the gameplay itself is fun, and you guys used to be great. These new updates make it impossible to rate you higher.

title: Got Some Ideas
text: First off really like the game. Fun when your bored. One thing I do think should be added is more ways to get keys. If you donâ€™t want to pay money you have to watch videos, which is fine but you only get a small amount of keys per video. Another thing, the little character things that make you collect an annoying amount of them to get the skin. I realize it keeps people playing the game but the amount you need compared to the amount you get is massively annoying. This last thing is something you could possibly add to make the game even more awesome. What if you could choose whether to be chased by zombies or killer robots instead of a cop? In other words, change the appearance of your pursuer. It would be so cool to be chased by zombies  on the subways. Or maybe aliens. It would make the game even more awesome. Thanks for listening to me talk your ear off. Hope you like my ideas!

title: good game but needs some quality of life changes
text: this game is good in regards to characters and visuals and controls, but there needs to be some changes to make the game funner. first of all, the slowness in the beginning and the amount of distance it takes for the game to speed up makes the game super boring for the first few minutes of the game, without constant head-start power ups/ jet packs, starting a new run is really boring and i do not appreciate how monotonous and dull in the first few thousand meters of the game especially when you get good at it. secondly, thereâ€™s a bug that when you pick up the golden sneakers and try to jump immediately after, the high jump effect does not apply. this stops you from allowing you to do funner plays and this really annoying bug results in your death as you expect to jump over a train but instead just face plant onto it. lastly, an unpopular opinion but when you get far into the run and there starts to be dead ends with no way to dodge trains, (for example a train moving towards you and one on your side at the same time) it makes the game significantly funner because you have to use your reflexes to use your hoverboard at the right time to be able to get out of the sticky situation, so please keep that train generation in. in conclusion this game is super good i would just appreciate some quality of life changes that would make the game funner.

title: This game is amazing

title: Subway surfers, our pride, our joy, our LIGHT

title: Please read every word. ğŸ˜Œ
text:
So, I just read what I believe is the very last review on this app, written Feb 5th, and I have to say that Annoyed Mom said everything WAYYY nicer than I ever could. The absolute fury that ensues within my body when I get a pair of Super (death) Sneakers and immediately slam into a bridge.. the feeling is truly something indescribable. 
Also, my cat has been missing for 3 days- this usually isnâ€™t relevant but I could find him, get him neutered, bring him home, AND feed him a succulent salmon dinner in the time that it takes to get my score to 100k in this game. A quick question as well, what am i to do when there isnt a single ad to watch, I have gone broke for hoverboards when they are being used to ease the painfully slow speed in the beginning, and everything is overpriced? just uhhhhhh lemme know. 

All that aside, I have played this game for many years and cant wait for the new update. Hopefully it brings things up to a 4 or 5. Thank you for reading!
